topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554d551563687236efe61600#post_554d551563687236efe61600
"Ultron somehow manages to fly a jet despite having no knowledge of such."
"Where did all these robots come from?"
"Why would Ultron make a trigger for his machine to be manually handled? I mean, couldn't he make a connection to it and trigger it remotely? Vision only cut him off the net. He's still connected with the rest of his bots. Couldn't he treat his machine like one of his bots?"
"Somehow, Nick manages to fly the Helicarrier when they needed to. How he fuelled it and where he fuelled it was out of the question."
"Vision magically creates a cape for no reason."
"Hulk and Black Widow romance."
